subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Lexical sets and QS letters
msgSnippet: ... Exactly so. -- John Cowan  cowan@ccil.org  http://ccil.org/~cowan If I have seen farther than others, it is because I am surrounded by dwarves. --Murray
messageBody:
Paul Tremblay scripsit:

> In contrast, John, are you saying that since "buy" belongs to the PRICE
> lexical set, that any user always uses "Bob" "Ice" for the spelling?

Exactly so.

--
John Cowan cowan@... http://ccil.org/~cowan
If I have seen farther than others, it is because I am surrounded by dwarves.
--Murray Gell-Mann
